signUp.content:
Dear User, 

Thank you for signing up on Dabinx, where we bring you the best in all shopping categoires.

signIn.content:
Hello User, 

welcome you back to Dabinx, your gateway to the latest store solutions. You have successfully signed in to our platform. Explore, discover, and make the most of what Dabinx has to offer!

orderPurchase.content:
Dear Customer, 

Thank you for shopping with Dabinx! Your recent order purchase has been processed. We're thrilled to provide you with the latest and greatest in shopping exprience. Your order details are as follows:

order.content:
Dear Customer, 

We appreciate your recent order at Dabinx. Below are the details of your recent order:

payment.content:
Dear Customer, 

Thank you for making a purchase at Dabinx. Your support helps us continue providing solutions. Here are the payment and purchase details for your recent transaction:

orderUpdate.content:
Dear Customer, 

We want to keep you informed about your order at Dabinx. Below are the updated details for your order:

productRemoved.content:
Dear Customer, 

We wanted to confirm that the following product has been successfully removed from your order at Dabinx due to limited quanitiy:

failedPayment.content:
Dear Customer, 

We regret to inform you that the payment for your recent order at Dabinx was unsuccessful. Please review the payment details and try again.

orderTracking.content:
Dear Customer, 

Your order at Dabinx is on its way!. Here's the tracking information for your order:

orderStatusUpdate.content:
Dear Customer, 

We want to keep you informed about the status of your order at Dabinx.

contactSupplier.content:
Dear Customer, 

You've requested to contact the supplier for a product at Dabinx. We're here to assist you. Please find the supplier's contact information below:

refundEmail.content:
Dear Customer, 

We're processing a refund for your recent order at Dabinx. Here are the details of the refund process:

orderAlertNotification.content:
Dear Admin, 

An order has been placed at Dabinx. Here are the order details for your reference:

productReviewAlert.content:
Dear Customer, 

Thank you for shopping at Dabinx! We invite you to review the products you've purchased. Your feedback helps us improve our services.

subscriptionAlert.content:
Dear Admin, 

Thanks for subscribing to Dabinx. Here are the subscription details for your reference:

withdrawPayment.content:
Dear Admin,

We have successfully received your withdrawal request. Please be advised that the payment will be processed and you can expect to receive it within the next 24 hours.

approveWithdrawal.content:
Dear Admin,

We are pleased to inform you that your withdrawal request has been approved and processed successfully. Below are the transaction details:

holdWithdrawal.content:
Dear Admin,

Your withdrawal request is currently on hold. Please contact Dabinx to facilitate the release of funds.

adminPayment.header: Payment processed already, SignUp almost completed
adminPayment.content:
Dear Admin,

Your withdrawal request is currently on hold. Please contact Dabinx to facilitate the release of funds.
